text: @realDonaldTrump @BarackObama became President in 2009.  Swine Flu occurred in 2009. It was not as deadly and contagious.  He inherited a situation of unpreparedness.  You have been in office since 2017. So, in 2020 - with warnings - you failed the American people. You. #coronavirus. #Covid_19
